column1: # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#id=1
#text=Taking the train into the city is so much fun !
#id=2
#text=We go into the train station and buy tickets for the train we want to take .
#id=3
#text=When the train arrives at the station it is very loud .
#id=4
#text=We wait for it to stop and then follow the other passengers on board .
#id=5
#text=We find our seats , hopefully near a window , and sit down .
#id=6
#text=When the conductor comes around , we give him our tickets and he punches a hole in each of them .
#id=7
#text=The train begins to move and it makes a clickety-clack sound as it travels towards the next stop .
#id=8
#text=The buildings and trees we pass look blurry because we are going so fast .
#id=9
#text=We pass railroad crossings with cars lined up waiting for us to pass .
#text=After 10 stops , at different train stations , we arrive at the big one in the city .
#text=We get off the train and take the escalator up to get out of the station .
